light_cloud_description: Spark Yun is an ultra-lightweight, enterprise-grade smart data platform. It enables swift big data computation, management, and security to unlock greater business value for enterprises.
light_cloud_description_mobile: Spark Yun is an ultra-lightweight, enterprise-grade smart data platform. It enables swift big data computation, management, and security to unlock greater business value for enterprises.
job_types_supported: Compatible with all major engines like Hadoop and K8s, with unified monitoring.
job_support: Supports all job types, from SQL and Spark to AI interactions and beyond.
real_work_description: Full lifecycle control: Run, Stop, Publish, Rerun (all, downstream, self), external calls, result passing, and parameters.
data_drives_value_description: The AI Era is Here. Partner with Spark Yun to Build Your Intelligent Data Center.
multi_platform_description: Discover data distribution and structure. Explore metadata, modeling, and multi-source visualization.
data_view_description: Powerful data processing and visualization turns complexity into clarity. Supports real-time monitoring to drive agile decision-making.
opensource_value: Helps enterprises build smart Data Center
